Title: Software Development Engineer in Test (Java)
JD:
About the job
    


          As a developer on the test automation architecture team, you will bring hands-on contributions to new test frameworks/solutions at E*TRADE. We are looking for a Senior SDET to join the team, with demonstrated ability to handle creation of testing tools independently – that includes building automated test frameworks, harnesses and unique automated testing tools to aid functional testing teams. We are looking for someone with experience designing applications, testing APIs, back-end services, and UI automation to work with in-sprint automation teams, drive projects, perform code reviews, build tools to analyze pass rates, and work closely with product, business & development teams on a daily basis.
Skills We Are Looking For
Writing multi-threading and thread safe code.Work with HTTP APIs – REST/SOAP.Understanding OOP principles.Well versed with common design patterns.Have used relational and noSQL databases, ex: MongoDBFull stack test automation experience – UI and API level.
Minimum Qualifications
Total experience 4-6 yearsExperience working with Java multi threaded coding.Building java base services from scratch.Experience with testing frameworks like TestNG, Cucumber.Experience with build/packing tools like Gradle, Jenkins etc.
